dict.string: Allow camera access so you can take photos or videos of products to list, compare, or attach to product reviews (for example: take a photo to add a new product or to upload an image when reporting product quality).
Allow access to your photo library to upload existing product images, receipts, or photos for product reviews (for example: choose an image of a product you want to list or share in a review).
Allow saving photos to your library so you can keep photos you take in the app (for example: save product photos or receipts to your device camera roll).
Allow microphone access to record short audio notes or product video sound when creating product reviews or seller listings (for example: record a 10â€“30 second voice note describing a product).

We use your location while the app is open to show nearby stores and local product availability (for example: show stores within 10 km that currently stock a product you searched for). You can change this permission in Settings.
